body: can you reproduce into a simpler codesandbox, if the validate is not working a simple codesandbox can reproduce the problem? in fact, I will do a codesandbox to prove it's working or not.
nvm, i think i see what you try to proof now.

This is not going to work you register at roof without any `name`. I think you try to share the validation logic, you should build those into a logic file and share the validator 

eg:
`register('test', youSharedValidation)`

@bluebill1049 I've updated the CSB (https://codesandbox.io/s/smoosh-sunset-t8q22?file=/src/App.js) by making 2 changes - 

1. Setting a `name` on the component and on the `register` call.
2. Moving validation logic out to a function.

Now, `getValues()` doesn't return the values of the inputs.

I think we can close this issue now: https://codesandbox.io/s/wandering-cdn-m61er?file=/src/ComplexInput.jsx

take a look at the codesandbox, it should resolve your problem.

@bluebill1049 Thanks for the CSB, I can see it works. But I made a fork of it to add some of my changes (only in validation), and it still doesn't work ðŸ˜“.

See https://codesandbox.io/s/icy-snowflake-3dzgo?file=/src/ComplexInput.jsx

**Steps to reproduce**

1. Submit form without any inputs. Notice it won't submit (expected, as validation fails).
2. Now enter any input in Count 1 field.
3. Then enter any input in Count 2 field.
4. Now submit form. See that both validations pass (notice console), but the form still won't submit.

**Differences from your CSB**

1. Added validation logic that tests for -

	a. At least 1 count field must be entered.
	b. For every count field that has a value, the corresponding weight field must have a value too.

So the key difference in my change is that validations dynamically depend on `getValues()`.

What is confusing for me is that both validations fail and pass correctly based on inputs, but the form won't submit when validation has failed at least once. On a refreshed page with all inputs entered correctly, the form submits without any issues.

repository.name: react-hook-form
